alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 27 at 4:51PM EST until February 28 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, localized snow accumulations up to an inch early this evening. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Lewis county. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 1 AM to 9 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities as snow showers move through. Submit snow reports through our website or social media. This is a potentially dangerous situation to be outdoors. If you must be outside, be sure to cover all exposed skin. Frostbite can occur in 30 minutes or less with apparent temperatures of 15 below zero or colder.
